Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, surveil 1, then you may have that creature make an experience check. [i](Exile a card from your graveyard with mana value greater than this creature’s power to put a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control successfully makes an experience check, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
